author: jvanzyl
msg: MNG-3274: Adding a flag to the metadata source so that at some point soon we can start turning on a strict mode that is just not going to allow a system without POMs.

author: wrowe
msg: More effectively explain apr_shm_remove, and the hints that
it provides to the caller.  Document these assumptions by
way of a proper test case, cleaning up irrespective of which
implementation is available on this platform.
